name: Tracks - The Toy Train Set Game
description: Jump into the ultimate toy sandbox and build the train set of your dreams! Create colourful railway systems, decorate beautiful towns, transport commuting passengers, and even ride your train in first-person.
minimum_requirements: 最低: OS: Windows 7/8/10 (64bit) プロセッサー: Intel Core i3 2GHz or equivalent メモリー: 4 GB RAM グラフィック: Dedicated graphics card with 1GB memory ストレージ: 2 GB 利用可能
